Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to represent the PLayer.

Each user has his own Player.

In the game each player has got 2 workers and a GodPower card.

One player is the Challenger: he selects the available GodPowers in the game and he chooses the starting player.

A player wins if his worker does the "move" operation from a level 2 "Block" Tile to a level 3 "Block" Tile.

If a player cannot complete a "move" operation and a "build" operation in his turn, he loses.

Since:
1.0

    • createWorker

      public void createWorker​(java.lang.String godCard, Conditions condition, java.util.List<UndecoratedWorker> totalWorkerList)
      Creats 2 specific worker classes as indicated by the GodCard.
      Parameters:
      godCard - Variable that represents which GodCard is at issue.
      condition - Variable that represents the condition as some specific Gods need.
      totalWorkerList - Variable that is a list of strings that represents all the workers in the game.

    • getWorkerList

      A list of strings that represents all the workers in the game.

    • chooseWorker

      public UndecoratedWorker chooseWorker​(int index)
      Selects a particular worker which is the one the player choose to do a "move" or "build" operation.
      Parameters:
      index - Variable that indicates the index of the worker in question.
      Returns:
      The worker that was chosen by the player at issue.

      public void deleteWorker()
